item.description:
This Meetup will be cross-posted with Boston Happy Hour. That group begins it's meetup at Grendels before going to John Harvards. Grendel's info is below.

Join the Happy Hour group at JOHN HARVARD'S original Brewery, AT 7:15, 33 Dunster St., Harvard Square.

John Harvards has 20-oz."beer flights" there which cost the same as ordinary 16 oz. drafts. That means you can sample all the beers they produce there. They also have pitchers you can share if you prefer.

http://www.johnharvards.com/index.shtml

We have a large TALL table with stools reserved, so people can mingle. They tell me "drinks only" is fine but appetizers are available.

We did John Harvards beer tasting once before, it was a very successful Meetup.

PLEASE DO join in with the other Meetup group at 5:30 at Grendels if you like! (If you sign up here you are also signed up for Grendels if you choose to attend.)

Grendels has always been a favorite Meetup venue. The food menu between 5 and 7:30 indoors is half price! Yes, really! with purchase of $3 drink. Grendels has a full range of draft beers.

http://www.grendelsden.com/menu/entrees.html

You could call it "Reverse Happy Hour"  since the food gets half off instead of the drinks, which amounts to the same thing. 

By subway take the Red Line to Harvard. (Recommended). If you drive you can park at the Charles Hotel parking garage, one Bennett St.
item.name: John Harvards Beer Flights! (& Grendels Den)
